NK040(thi)022:1: // mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i las byang byin rlabs sgo 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)022:2: na mo gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ni h'u /
NK040(thi)022:3: bla ma yum chen d+aak+ki'i tshogs rnams la //
NK040(thi)022:4: gus pas btud de mkha' 'gro sde lnga yi //
NK040(thi)022:5: bsgrub pa'i kha bskang las byang 'dir spro bya //
NK040(thi)022:6: de la gsum ste sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes //
NK040(thi)022:7: bye brag bdun gsum nyer gcig grangs su bstan //
NK040(thi)022:8: sbyor ba sngon 'gro bdun ste rten bshams dang //
NK040(thi)022:9: skyabs 'gro sems bskyed rgyun bshags bya ba dang //
NK040(thi)022:10: bka' bsgo mtshams gcod mchod rdzas byin rlabs dang //
NK040(thi)022:11: dngos gzhi bdun ste brten pa lha bskyed cing //
NK040(thi)022:12: spyan 'dren bzhugs gsol phyag 'tshal mchod pa dang //
NK040(thi)022:13: bstod pa bya zhing gsang sngags bzlas pa'o //
NK040(thi)022:14: rjes la bdun te tshogs bskul sbyin bsregs dang //
NK040(thi)022:15: gtor ma btang zhing bshags pa bya ba dang //
NK040(thi)022:16: bkra shis brjod dang rdzogs rim bsgom pa'o //
NK040(thi)022:17: de ni phrin las rtsa ba sdom byang ngo //
NK040(thi)022:18: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK040(thi)022:19: 'dir rnal 'byor pa dbang thob cing dam tshig dang ldan pas //
NK040(thi)022:20: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i sgrub pa nyams su len pa la gsum //
NK040(thi)022:21: thog mar sbyor ba sngon 'gro'i dang po rten bshams pa ni //
NK040(thi)022:22: gnas dur khrod dam rab tu dben pa'i sar //
NK040(thi)022:23: man+dala mchod gtor rnams gzhung ltar bshams la /
NK040(thi)022:24: gnyis pa skyabs su 'gro ba ni /
NK040(thi)022:25: thun mong spyi dang mthun par byas la /
NK040(thi)022:26: gsum pa sems bskyed pa ni /
NK040(thi)022:27: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub la 'god pa'i phyir du /
NK040(thi)022:28: bdag gi sgo gsum mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug
NK040(thi)022:29: am snyam pa'i smon pa sems bskyed dang ldan pa'i
NK040(thi)022:30: ngang nas tshad med bzhi bsgom mo //
NK040(thi)022:31: bzhi pa rgyun bshags bya ba ni /
NK040(thi)022:32: ma mi min ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)022:33: lab sgron khyed la skyabs su mchi /
NK040(thi)022:35: lnga pa bgegs la bka' bsgo ba ni /
NK040(thi)022:36: sngon du 'gro ba'i gtor ma la /
NK040(thi)022:38: sarba big+h+nan+na na ma sarba ta th+aa ga ta b+h+yo
NK040(thi)022:39: bi shwa mu khe b+h+ya sarba that+kham u ga te
NK040(thi)022:40: s+pha ra na e mam ga ga na kham grih+na
NK040(thi)022:41: dam e dam b+ha ling ta ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)022:42: ces pas bgegs 'bul te bka' bsgo ba ni /
NK040(thi)022:43: badz+ra d+ha ki ni kro ti ka li bam ha ri ni sa h'u /
NK040(thi)022:44: ces khros ma nag mo'i skur wal gyis bskyed la /
NK040(thi)022:46: nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren 'byung po'i tshogs //
NK040(thi)022:47: bdud sde mi bzad dpung dang bcas pa rnams //
NK040(thi)022:48: nga ni rab 'jigs rdo rje khros ma'i sku //
NK040(thi)022:49: nga yi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar //
NK040(thi)022:50: mchod sbyin glud gtor dam pa 'di longs la //
NK040(thi)022:51: nga yi gnas 'dir ma 'dug phyir dengs shig /
NK040(thi)022:52: gal te mi 'gro bka' las 'da' gyur na //
NK040(thi)022:53: khro bo khro mo'i tshogs dang bcas rnams kyis //
NK040(thi)022:54: khyod kyi lus ngag yid gsum thams cad kun //
NK040(thi)022:55: ma rung brlag pa 'gyur ba gdon mi za //
NK040(thi)022:56: de bas 'di ru ma 'dug gzhan du dengs //
NK040(thi)022:57: badz+ra d+aak+ki ni kro ti ka li bam ha ri ni sa h'u /
NK040(thi)022:58: sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ni h'u /
NK040(thi)022:60: grih+n+aa pa ya grih+n+aa pa ya h'u /
NK040(thi)022:61: +aa na ya hoh b+ha ga w+aan /
NK040(thi)022:62: bid+y+aa r+aa dza ya h'u phatah zhes h'u bzhi'i sngags brjod cing bgegs bskrad do //
NK040(thi)022:63: drug pa mtshams bcad pa ni /
NK040(thi)022:64: h'u h+r+aih nga ni rab 'jigs khros ma nag mo'i sku //
NK040(thi)022:65: mtshon cha 'od zer khro tshogs dpag med 'phros //
NK040(thi)022:66: rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar ba dang //
NK040(thi)022:67: tho ba rgya gram phur pa brag ri'i gur //
NK040(thi)022:68: ye shes lnga yi me dpung phyogs bcur 'bar //
NK040(thi)022:69: bsgrub la bar du gcod pa'i dgra dang bgegs //
NK040(thi)022:70: thams cad rdul phran bzhin du brlag par byed //
NK040(thi)022:71: steng 'og phyogs mtshams kun du khyab par bsrung //
NK040(thi)022:72: bka' dang dam la su yang 'da' ma byed //
NK040(thi)022:73: badz+ra karma ki li ki la ya dz+wa la ram yak+sha kro ta man+da la h'u phata /
NK040(thi)022:74: bdun pa mchod rdzas byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
NK040(thi)022:76: stong pa'i ngang las sman raka gtor gsum mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad +aahmh'u /
NK040(thi)022:77: lan gsum gyis byin gyi brlabs /
NK040(thi)022:78: +aahmh'u push+pe d+hush+pe a lo ke g+han+d+he nee wi t+ya shap+da +aa h'u /
NK040(thi)022:79: +aahmh'u sarba pany+tsa a mri ta h'u h+r+ai th+aa /
NK040(thi)022:80: ces sman phud rigs lnga 'od du zhu nas ye shes bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs /
NK040(thi)022:81: +aahmh'u ma h+aa rak+ta dz+wa ma man+da la h'u h+r+ai th+aa /
NK040(thi)022:82: ces rak+ta byang sems dmar po ye shes bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs /
NK040(thi)022:83: +aahmh'u ma h+aa b+ha ling+ta te dz+wa b+ha ling+ta b+ha
NK040(thi)022:84: la b+ha ti gu h+ya sa ma ya h'u h+r+ai
NK040(thi)022:85: th+aa / ces gtor ma ye shes kyi bdud rtsir 'dod yon lnga'i phung po byin gyis brlabs /
NK040(thi)022:86: spyi don gnyis pa dngos gzhi la bdun dang po rten dam tshig pa bskyed pa ni /
NK040(thi)022:87: swa b+h+aa wa shud+d+he sarba d+har+m+aa swa b+ha wa shud+d+he a /
NK040(thi)022:88: phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad mi dmigs stong pa nyid du gyur /
NK040(thi)022:89: stong pa'i ngang las zhing khams rnam par dag pa
NK040(thi)022:90: u rgyan rang byung gi dur khrod chen po'i dbus
NK040(thi)022:91: su / thod pa skam rlon brtsegs pa spel ma dang /
NK040(thi)022:92: rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang /
NK040(thi)022:93: gru bzhi sgo bzhi rgyan rta bab bang rim pad+ma
NK040(thi)022:94: gdug tog ri dwags chos 'khor dang ldan pa'i steng
NK040(thi)022:95: khang phyur bu bang rim bzhi pa la /
NK040(thi)022:96: rdo rje rin po che'i tog gis mtshan pa phyi
NK040(thi)022:97: rdo rje'i rwa gur dang ye shes kyi me ri
NK040(thi)022:98: dmar nag rab tu 'bar ba'i pho brang gis phyi
NK040(thi)022:99: nang med par 'od dmar po'i rba klong 'khrugs pa'i
NK040(thi)022:100: dbus su / gdan pad+ma 'dab bzhi dang chos 'byung
NK040(thi)022:101: nyi ma ro'i steng du +aahmathinga nag 'od du 'bar
NK040(thi)022:102: ba las 'od zer 'phros bskul don gnyis byas /
NK040(thi)022:103: tshur 'dus yongs su gyur pa las /
NK040(thi)022:104: a ma lab kyi sgron ma khros ma nag mo dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dbyer med pa /
NK040(thi)022:105: sku mdog mthing nag tu 'dug pa zhal gcig phyag
NK040(thi)022:106: gnyis pa spyi bor na phag zhal nag po'i ngur
NK040(thi)022:107: sgra sgrog pa / shar gyi pad 'dab la sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro dkar mo /
NK040(thi)022:108: lho'i pad 'dab la rin chen mkha' 'gro ser mo /
NK040(thi)022:109: nub kyi pad 'dab la pad+ma mkha' 'gro dmar mo /
NK040(thi)022:110: byang gi pad 'dab la las kyi mkha' 'gro ljang mo /
NK040(thi)022:111: thams cad kyang gcer bu rin po che dang rus pa'i rgyan drug gis brgyan pa /
NK040(thi)022:113: dbu skra nag po mthur du khrol ba g.yas gri gug nam mkha' la phyar ba /
NK040(thi)022:114: g.yon thod khrag thugs kar 'dzin pa gru mo kha t+w+aam kha bsnams pa la /
NK040(thi)022:115: d+aa ma ru dang ting ting shags kyis brgyan pa /
NK040(thi)022:116: zhabs g.yas bskum pa'i rting pa b+ha ga la gtad pa /
NK040(thi)022:117: g.yon brkyang ba gar thabs su bzhengs pa /
NK040(thi)022:118: gtso 'khor de rnams la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
NK040(thi)022:119: las 'das pa'i mkha' 'gro shugs 'gro bye ba dung
NK040(thi)022:121: lha tshogs de dag gi spyi bor /
NK040(thi)022:122: mgrin pa +aah thugs kar h'u las 'od zer 'phros
NK040(thi)022:123: pas rang bzhin gyi gnas nas dbang gi lha rgyal
NK040(thi)022:125: de nas dbang bskur khrus gsol ni /
NK040(thi)022:126: pany+tsa ku la sa p+aa ri wa ra badz+ra sa
NK040(thi)022:127: ma ya h'u dzah pany+tsha ku la sa pa ri
NK040(thi)022:129: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la mngon par dbang bskur du gsol /
NK040(thi)022:131: bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur bas lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa dag /
NK040(thi)022:132: chu'i lhag ma yar lud pa las /
NK040(thi)022:133: gtso mo la mi bskyod pas dbu rgyan /
NK040(thi)022:134: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro la rnam par snang mdzad /
NK040(thi)022:135: rin chen mkha' 'gro la rin chen 'byung ldan /
NK040(thi)022:136: pad+ma mkha' 'gro la snang ba mtha' yas /
NK040(thi)022:137: las kyi mkha' 'gro la don yod grub pas dbu brgyan par gyur /
NK040(thi)022:138: h'u tram h+r+aih+aah gnyis pa lha'i dkyil 'khor spyan 'dren pa ni /
NK040(thi)022:140: rkang gling dang thod rnga la sogs pa'i rol mo dkrol la /
NK040(thi)022:141: h'u h+r+aih chos nyid mi 'gyur dbyings kyi pho brang nas //
NK040(thi)022:142: rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)022:143: rang byung lhun gyis grub pa'i pho brang nas //
NK040(thi)022:144: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas gshegs dgos 'dod yon
NK040(thi)022:145: tan 'byung ba'i rin chen mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas chags
NK040(thi)022:146: med skyon dang bral ba'i pho brang nas //
NK040(thi)022:147: pad+ma mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas mngon spyod phrin las grub
NK040(thi)022:148: pa'i las kyi mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol
NK040(thi)022:149: // +aahmh'u gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ni badz+ra sa
NK040(thi)022:150: ma ya h'u dzah dzahmh'u bam hoh ces ye shes
NK040(thi)022:151: kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig pa la thim par bsam
NK040(thi)022:152: // la / gsum pa bzhugs su gsol ba ni /
NK040(thi)022:153: h'u h+r+aih bde chen lhun gyis grub pa'i pho brang nas //
NK040(thi)022:154: thabs shes nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng du //
NK040(thi)022:155: mkha' 'gro dpa' bo dpa' mo'i tshogs rnams kun //
NK040(thi)022:156: mi g.yo dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol //
NK040(thi)022:157: +aahmh'u gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ni sa ma ya tish+tha lhan /
NK040(thi)022:158: ces dam tshig pa dang ye shes pa dbyer med par bstim mo //
NK040(thi)022:160: h'u h+r+aih mi 'gyur dbyings kyi yum chen mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)022:161: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro 'khor dang bcas pa la //
NK040(thi)022:162: bdag cag lus ngag yid gsum rab dad pa'i //
NK040(thi)022:163: sgo gsum gnyis med gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK040(thi)022:164: +aahmh'u gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki a ti pu ho /
NK040(thi)022:166: lnga pa mchod pa 'bul ba ni /
NK040(thi)022:167: h'u h+r+aih yon chab khrus chab bdug spos sna tshogs dang //
NK040(thi)022:168: me tog mar me dri bzang mchod pa'i sprin //
NK040(thi)022:169: zhal zas sgra snyan rol mo sna tshogs dang //
NK040(thi)022:170: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos la sogs //
NK040(thi)022:171: bla ma d+aak+ki'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul //
NK040(thi)022:172: thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol //
NK040(thi)022:173: +aahmh'u gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ni ar+g+ham pat+yam push+pe
NK040(thi)022:174: d+hup+pe a lo ke g+han+d+he nee bi d+ya shap+da puts+tsha
NK040(thi)022:175: ho / h'u h+r+aih khams gsum zhing khams ma lus thams cad nas //
NK040(thi)022:176: sku gsum lha tshogs 'khor bcas thugs rje'i mgron //
NK040(thi)022:177: stong gsum bdud rtsi lnga yis khengs pa'i rdzas //
NK040(thi)022:178: rak+ta nyon mongs khams gsum bsgral ba'i khrag /
NK040(thi)022:179: gtor ma 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru bsngo //
NK040(thi)022:180: +aahmh'u gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ni ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kha hi /
NK040(thi)022:182: ma h+aa ba ling+ta kha hi /
NK040(thi)022:183: ces mchod rdzas 'dod yon gyi tshogs su gyur nas lha tshogs thams cad dgyes par bsam mo //
NK040(thi)022:184: drug pa bstod pa bya ba ni /
NK040(thi)022:185: h'u h+r+aih chos kyi dbyings las sgyu ma'i skur ston pa //
NK040(thi)022:186: rgyal ba'i yum chen bcom ldan rnal 'byor ma //
NK040(thi)022:187: ma chags skyon bral khros ma nag mor ston //
NK040(thi)022:188: gar dgu'i nyams ldan khro dang 'dzum pa'i zhal //
NK040(thi)022:189: zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag rngams pa'i sku //
NK040(thi)022:190: spyan gsum sdang mig dmar zlum glog ltar 'khyug /
NK040(thi)022:191: mche gtsigs ljag 'dril smin ma me ltar 'bar //
NK040(thi)022:192: g.yas pas gri gug skye shi rtsad nas gcod //
NK040(thi)022:193: g.yon pas chags med b+han+d+ha dmar bskang bsnams //
NK040(thi)022:194: brkyang bskum zhabs gnyis ro yi gdan la 'gying //
NK040(thi)022:195: dbu gtsug phag zhal mthing nag ngur sgra yis //
NK040(thi)022:196: khams gsum ma lus dbang du bsdud par byed //
NK040(thi)022:197: dbu skra khams nag rigs lngas dbu la brgyan //
NK040(thi)022:198: snyan cha mgul chings gdu 'u rab tu brgyan //
NK040(thi)022:199: kha t+w+aam mchan bcug dug gsum rtsad nas gcod //
NK040(thi)022:200: 'du byed rnam dag mgo phreng du mas brgyan //
NK040(thi)022:201: rin chen rgyan spras dar gyi cod pan 'phur //
NK040(thi)022:202: rus pa'i rgyan drug dril chung phreng bas mdzes //
NK040(thi)022:203: glang chen stag dang zhing chen na bza' gsol //
NK040(thi)022:204: h'u h'u phata phata phem gyi sgra sgrog pas //
NK040(thi)022:205: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dbang bsdud las la 'gyed //
NK040(thi)022:206: las bzhi bsgrub phyir d+aak+ki sde bzhis bskor //
NK040(thi)022:207: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)022:208: chos dbyings rnam dag skye med chos kyi dbyings //
NK040(thi)022:209: 'gags med rtsa bral sems nyid don gyi ngang //
NK040(thi)022:210: mtha' dbus med pa mtha' bral stong pa'i yum //
NK040(thi)022:211: ma yum chen chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)022:212: 'gyur ba med pa rdo rje'i sku sprul ma //
NK040(thi)022:213: dgos 'dod kun 'byung rin chen sku sprul ma //
NK040(thi)022:214: gdod nas dag pa pad+ma'i sku sprul ma /
NK040(thi)022:215: phrin las grub pa las kyi sku sprul ma //
NK040(thi)022:216: ma yum chen sku lnga lhun grub ma la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)022:217: ces don dang mthun par bstod do //
NK040(thi)022:218: bdun pa bzlas pa bya ba ni /
NK040(thi)022:219: gtso 'khor lnga'i spyi bor zla ba'i steng du dkar po /
NK040(thi)022:220: mgrin pa pad+ma'i steng du +aahdamara po /
NK040(thi)022:221: thugs kar nyi ma'i steng du h'u sngon po /
NK040(thi)022:222: lte bar chos 'byung dmar po'i steng du bam dmar po de dag gi mthar /
NK040(thi)022:223: +aahmh'u gu ru d+aak+ki ni kro ti ka li bam ha ri ni sa h'u /
NK040(thi)022:224: ces kha dog rtsa ba'i ye ge dang mthun par
NK040(thi)022:225: g.yon du 'khor ba las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros
NK040(thi)022:226: pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
NK040(thi)022:227: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku
NK040(thi)022:228: gsung thugs mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'bul bas de dag
NK040(thi)022:229: gi sku gsung thugs kyi dbang dang byin rlabs dngos
NK040(thi)022:230: grub ma lus pa 'od zer dmar po'i rnam par
NK040(thi)022:231: bsdus nas bdag gi gnas lngar thim pas sdig sgrib
NK040(thi)022:232: bag chags dag nas mchog thun mong gi dngos grub
NK040(thi)022:234: rtsa 'khor lo lnga dang bcas pa thams cad mkha'
NK040(thi)022:235: 'gro'i sku nas 'bras tsam dpag med til gyi gong
NK040(thi)022:236: bu ltar gtib par bsam la bdag gi sngags brjod
NK040(thi)022:237: pa tsam gyis gnas lnga'i lha rnams kyi sngags sgra
NK040(thi)022:239: stong gsum thams cad 'dar shig shig 'ur 'ur ldem
NK040(thi)022:240: ldem du gyur nas dbang du 'dus par bsam la
NK040(thi)022:241: / gong gi 'bru bco brgyad pa snying po ci 'grub bzla zhing /
NK040(thi)022:242: thun mthar stong tshig mchod bstod bya'o //
NK040(thi)022:243: spyi don gsum pa rjes kyi cho ga la bdun te /
NK040(thi)022:244: dang po tshogs kyi mchod pa dang /
NK040(thi)022:245: gnyis pa gnad nas bskul pa dang /
NK040(thi)022:246: gsum pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga rnams ni gzhan du shes la /
NK040(thi)022:247: bzhi pa gtor ma btang zhing lhag ma'i cho ga bya ba ni /
NK040(thi)022:248: gtor ma phyir dpag la rak+ta'i phud bran la /
NK040(thi)022:250: mdzes pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa mtshon pa'i phyag rgya bca' la /
NK040(thi)022:252: dzahmh'u bam hoh sa ma ya phem phem /
NK040(thi)022:253: ta ki ra tsa h'u dza dza ces sogs de nas mchod cing phrin las bcol ba ni /
NK040(thi)022:254: h'u h+r+aih rdo rje khros ma'i bka' nyan las byed tshogs //
NK040(thi)022:255: rigs bzhi mkha' 'gro shugs 'gro 'khor dang bcas //
NK040(thi)022:256: dbang phyug nyer brgyad mkha' 'gro sum cu gnyis //
NK040(thi)022:257: ging chen bco brgyad long ka bcu drug ma //
NK040(thi)022:258: ma bdun sring bzhi 'bar ma chen mo brgyad //
NK040(thi)022:259: pho nya drug cu rtsa bzhi 'bum phrag mkha' 'gro'i tshogs //
NK040(thi)022:260: gang bcol phrin las thog med sgrub mdzad pa //
NK040(thi)022:261: bstan ma bcu gnyis sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas //
NK040(thi)022:262: bka' yi pham 'bab lhag gtor 'di longs la //
NK040(thi)022:263: zhi rgyas dbang drag 'gugs 'dren mnan gzir sogs //
NK040(thi)022:264: ci ltar bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod //
NK040(thi)022:265: ces gtor ma phyir bskyang ngo //
NK040(thi)022:266: lnga pa bshags pa bya ba ni /
NK040(thi)022:267: yid kyis gnong 'gyod drag pos thal mo sbyar la /
NK040(thi)022:268: rje btsun mkha' 'gro'i lha tshogs dgongs su gsol //
NK040(thi)022:269: bdag sogs ma rig rmongs shing las ngan pas //
NK040(thi)022:270: nyes ltung sgrib pa'i las rnams ci bgyis pa //
NK040(thi)022:271: mi 'chab gnong 'gyod drag pos mthol bshags nas //
NK040(thi)022:272: byams pa'i thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang //
NK040(thi)022:273: dmigs med don gyi tshangs pa stsal du gsol //
NK040(thi)022:274: +aahmh'u gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki sa ma ya sogs yig brgya bzlas /
NK040(thi)022:275: drug pa bkra shis brjod pa ni /
NK040(thi)022:277: bcom ldan sh+aakya thub pa yi //
NK040(thi)022:278: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas //
NK040(thi)022:279: lam bgrod byang chub mchog thob pa'i //
NK040(thi)022:280: bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /
NK040(thi)022:281: skye ba med las gzugs sku 'char //
NK040(thi)022:282: 'gro rnams bde la bkod mdzad pa //
NK040(thi)022:283: yum chen shes rab phar phyin ma'i //
NK040(thi)022:284: bkra shis tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal chen bzhis //
NK040(thi)022:285: mchod pa'i tshogs kyis rab mchod cing //
NK040(thi)022:286: nyin mtshan kun tu srung byed pa //
NK040(thi)022:287: bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /
NK040(thi)022:288: tshang ba'am d+aak+ki lnga'i bkra shis brjod do //
NK040(thi)022:290: snod bcud thams cad rten gzhal yas khang la bsdu /
NK040(thi)022:291: gzhal yas khang gi lha tshogs thams cad bdag nyid gtso mo la thim nas /
NK040(thi)022:292: bdag kyang rim gyis 'od du zhu nas /
NK040(thi)022:293: thugs ka'i sngags phreng h'u dang bcas pa la bsdu /
NK040(thi)022:294: h'u mtha' nas thig le na d+aa la thim ste /
NK040(thi)022:295: dmigs med spros bral gyi ngang la bzhag la /
NK040(thi)022:296: dge ba byang chub tu bsngo'o //
NK040(thi)022:297: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i dkyil 'khor cho ga byin rlab sgo 'byed ces bya ba /
NK040(thi)022:298: don yod rdo rje'i gzhung la brten nas /
NK040(thi)022:299: bya bral ba kun dga' 'bum gyis rab tu gsal bar byas so ////
